attributes.action: Get Captain Tom Moore a Knighthood
attributes.additional_details: Captain Moore is a 99 year old WW2 veteran who not only has survived WW2 but more recently a hip replacement & skin cancer, despite this decided to do his part by starting with a very admiral target of £1000 which has been broken time & time & time again, at the time of writing this he has just broken the £10,000,000 mark!!! He is doing this by walking laps around his garden & has vowed to continue as long as donations keep coming in! Once again his country called & he answered! Such a hero!
attributes.background: Consult with members of the honours board & give Captain Tom Moore a Knighthood for his outstanding work & fundraising efforts for the NHS & his country!

rejection.details:
We know lots of people want to petition for Colonel Moore to receive an honour, but the Government will only accept individual nominations, not petitions, so we can’t publish your petition.

To submit a nomination for an honour, visit: http://www.gov.uk/honours/
